headline: Local attorney Scott Pullins officially launches Ohio House campaign
author: Bob Pepalis
sentences:
“The mess that we’re in now is what results when you hand over this authority to liberal special interest groups and left-wing judges.”
A Health Freedom Bill to outlaw mask and vaccine mandates and vaccine passports also is a priority, he said.
Pullins, an attorney in Mount Vernon and member of the Knox County Republican Central Committee, said his 18-year-old daughter, Alaina Quinn Pullins, will manage his campaign.
Education reform to include more school choice options and outlawing the teaching of Critical Race Theory are other priorities he listed.
The exact district and its boundaries still must be set, as the Ohio Supreme Court threw out the recently redrawn districts.
Pullins plans to sponsor a constitutional amendment to get rid of Ohio’s new process for redistricting.
He attended Ohio University and earned his bachelor's in political science from Ohio State University.
“Our system for drawing statehouse districts has worked well for my entire lifetime,” said Pullins.
Republican Scott Pullins announced he will run for the Ohio House of Representatives.
Pullins is a charter school board member, political consultant and writer.
He earned his Juris Doctorate from Capital University Law School.
He cofounded the Ohio Taxpayers Association.
She is a senior at Mount Vernon High School.
Mike DeWine for abusing his authority.
